name: 02_front
description: Middle.co version 1.0 06/13/2015 Luke Payyapilli 2015 (luke.payyapilli@gmail.com) This program is to allow people to create an account and store images of their journey through life. Additional features include:  -creating posts  -displaying posts  -deleting posts New features to be added include: -creating captions -updating/deleting captions -newsfeed and followers for users to browse Basic Installation Requirements: None (all functionality through the web) Copyright Luke Payyapilli 2015
